review: Works great and is very convenient for streaming music, games, and YouTube videos. Another great thing is that if you download the Chromecast app, you can stream your phone screen to your TV, which can allow you to show pictures and videos you've taken. All in all, for $35, I can't complain.

review: I won't say if this is a good or bad product. I will say if you are like me and try to use it with an AT&T; 2-Wire router it may not work. They are not supported. Don't expect to get an answer from a AT&T; repairman because you won't. Guess it goes against their U-verse sales. I have read a bunch on re-configuring the router to make it work but so far I haven't had any luck. I guess some of you guru's can. I will have to go back to my old WD-Live.
